course_description: LTL 201E aims to foster reflective practice by encouraging students to apply what theyÂ¿ve learned in LTL200 to their work in facilitating LTL100 and reflecting on this experience. This requires that students apply critical thinking skills both in and out of the classroom. Furthermore, this course reflects the goals of Oxford College by helping LTLFs apply leadership to real life and teaching them how to begin developing personal agency, capacities, and skills.
prerequisites: LTL_OX 100 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
